title: Automatically switch to insert mode issue
body: If I run a command say "grep fixme" then after it runs I press arrow up the command I previously typed will show up. Then if I use left key to go to "grep" and add some text on it instead of adding it will replace chars. And there is no way to get out of this insert input mode.

comments.body: I agree that this should be fixed.
I have the same probleme ! very annoying . any solution ?

That's something you need to enable on cmd Properties.
Or running Powershell and then launch bash from there.
If I go back to the beginning of the line and start press "x" 4 times it will cover "grep", but if you press enter to run you actually get "xxxxgrep" http://i.imgur.com/v94thC4.png
